page.title: 17MY DAY
page.content: 7.10hrs Dad gets up,makes breakfast and eats it. 7.25hrs Mam has breakfast in bed.My brother and I arise,make and eat our breakfast. 7.50hrs Mam arises,washes,dresses.Boys play on computer. 8.00hrs Dad leaves for work at Darlington(20 mile journey by car). 8.35hrs Go to school (5 minute walk). 8.55hrs Assembly then lessons. 10.30-10.45hrs Break followed by more lessons. 12.00hrs Have lunch and play in yard. 13.15hrs Start afternoon session. 14.25-14.35hrs Playtime. 14.40hrs More lessons. 15.45hrs End of school go to shop. 16.00hrs Go out and play with friends. 17.00hrs Teatime.Swimming lesson.Read. 19.00hrs Watch T.V.Go to bed.
